title: aruL purivAi
sahitya:
aruL purivAi karuNaik-kaDalE Aruyir anaittum amara vAzhvu peravE


anupallavi

  paripUrNa sadAnanda vAriyE bhakta rakSakanE paramAtmanE


caraNam    aruNOdayam pOL Atma shAntiyumarivuNmai inbum tiruvum taruvAi
dharmap-payir vAzhum taruNa mAmazhaiyE tangulagengilum mangaLam pongavE
